001package ca.gc.cra.radar.config;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.validation.Net;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.validation.Strings;
005import java.nio.file.InvalidPathException;
006import java.nio.file.Path;
007import java.util.Locale;
008import java.util.Map;
009import java.util.Objects;
010import java.util.Optional;
011
012/**
013 * Configuration for the assemble CLI pipeline.
014 *
015 * @param ioMode input mode ({@link IoMode#FILE} or {@link IoMode#KAFKA})
016 * @param kafkaBootstrap Kafka bootstrap servers when Kafka is used
017 * @param kafkaSegmentsTopic topic supplying captured segments in Kafka mode
018 * @param kafkaHttpPairsTopic topic receiving HTTP pairs in Kafka mode
019 * @param kafkaTnPairsTopic topic receiving TN3270 pairs in Kafka mode
020 * @param inputDirectory directory containing serialized segment files when in file mode
021 * @param outputDirectory root directory for assembled outputs
022 * @param httpEnabled whether HTTP reconstruction is enabled
023 * @param tnEnabled whether TN3270 reconstruction is enabled
024 * @param httpOutputDirectory optional override for HTTP output directory
025 * @param tnOutputDirectory optional override for TN3270 output directory
026 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
027 */
028public record AssembleConfig(
029    IoMode ioMode,
030    Optional<String> kafkaBootstrap,
031    String kafkaSegmentsTopic,
032    String kafkaHttpPairsTopic,
033    String kafkaTnPairsTopic,
034    Path inputDirectory,
035    Path outputDirectory,
036    boolean httpEnabled,
037    boolean tnEnabled,
038    Optional<Path> httpOutputDirectory,
039    Optional<Path> tnOutputDirectory) {
040
041  private static final Path DEFAULT_BASE = defaultBaseDirectory();
042
043  /**
044   * Normalizes assemble configuration values.
045   *
046   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
047   */
048  public AssembleConfig {
049    ioMode = Objects.requireNonNullElse(ioMode, IoMode.FILE);
050    kafkaBootstrap = sanitizeBootstrap(kafkaBootstrap);
051    kafkaSegmentsTopic = Strings.sanitizeTopic("kafkaSegmentsTopic", kafkaSegmentsTopic);
052    kafkaHttpPairsTopic = Strings.sanitizeTopic("kafkaHttpPairsTopic", kafkaHttpPairsTopic);
053    kafkaTnPairsTopic = Strings.sanitizeTopic("kafkaTnPairsTopic", kafkaTnPairsTopic);
054    inputDirectory = normalizePath("inputDirectory", inputDirectory);
055    outputDirectory = normalizePath("outputDirectory", outputDirectory);
056    httpOutputDirectory = sanitizeOptionalPath("httpOutputDirectory", httpOutputDirectory);
057    tnOutputDirectory = sanitizeOptionalPath("tnOutputDirectory", tnOutputDirectory);
058
059    if (!httpEnabled && !tnEnabled) {
060      throw new IllegalArgumentException("At least one protocol must be enabled");
061    }
062    if (ioMode == IoMode.KAFKA && kafkaBootstrap.isEmpty()) {
063      throw new IllegalArgumentException("kafkaBootstrap is required when ioMode=KAFKA");
064    }
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Returns a baseline configuration pointing at local directories.
069   *
070   * @return default assemble configuration
071   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
072   */
073  public static AssembleConfig defaults() {
074    return new AssembleConfig(
075        IoMode.FILE,
076        Optional.empty(),
077        "radar.segments",
078        "radar.http.pairs",
079        "radar.tn3270.pairs",
080        DEFAULT_BASE.resolve("capture").resolve("segments"),
081        DEFAULT_BASE.resolve("assemble"),
082        true,
083        false,
084        Optional.empty(),
085        Optional.empty());
086  }
087
088  /**
089   * Creates a configuration instance from CLI-style key/value pairs.
090   *
091   * @param options key/value pairs such as {@code in}, {@code out}, {@code kafkaBootstrap}
092   * @return populated configuration
093   * @throws IllegalArgumentException when values are invalid or required settings are missing
094   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
095   */
096  public static AssembleConfig fromMap(Map<String, String> options) {
097    Objects.requireNonNull(options, "options");
098    AssembleConfig defaults = defaults();
099
100    IoMode ioMode = parseIoMode(options.get("ioMode"), defaults.ioMode());
101    Optional<String> kafkaBootstrap = sanitizeBootstrap(optionalString(options.get("kafkaBootstrap")));
102
103    Path input = defaults.inputDirectory();
104    String kafkaSegmentsTopic = defaults.kafkaSegmentsTopic();
105    String inRaw = firstNonBlank(options, "in", "segments");
106    if (inRaw != null) {
107      if (inRaw.startsWith("kafka:")) {
108        ioMode = IoMode.KAFKA;
109        kafkaSegmentsTopic = Strings.sanitizeTopic("kafkaSegmentsTopic", inRaw.substring("kafka:".length()));
110      } else {
111        input = parsePath("in", inRaw);
112      }
113    }
114    String kafkaSegmentsOverride = options.get("kafkaSegmentsTopic");
115    if (kafkaSegmentsOverride != null && !kafkaSegmentsOverride.isBlank()) {
116      kafkaSegmentsTopic = Strings.sanitizeTopic("kafkaSegmentsTopic", kafkaSegmentsOverride);
117    }
118
119    String outOverride = firstNonBlank(options, "out", "--out");
120    Path output = outOverride == null ? defaults.outputDirectory() : parsePath("out", outOverride);
121    boolean httpEnabled = parseBoolean(options.get("httpEnabled"), true);
122    boolean tnEnabled = parseBoolean(options.get("tnEnabled"), false);
123
124    Optional<Path> httpOut = optionalPath("httpOut", firstNonBlank(options, "httpOut", "--httpOut"));
125    Optional<Path> tnOut = optionalPath("tnOut", firstNonBlank(options, "tnOut", "--tnOut"));
126
127    String kafkaHttpPairsTopic = optionalString(options.get("kafkaHttpPairsTopic"))
128        .map(value -> Strings.sanitizeTopic("kafkaHttpPairsTopic", value))
129        .orElse(defaults.kafkaHttpPairsTopic());
130    String kafkaTnPairsTopic = optionalString(options.get("kafkaTnPairsTopic"))
131        .map(value -> Strings.sanitizeTopic("kafkaTnPairsTopic", value))
132        .orElse(defaults.kafkaTnPairsTopic());
133
134    if (!httpEnabled && !tnEnabled) {
135      throw new IllegalArgumentException("At least one protocol must be enabled");
136    }
137
138    if (ioMode == IoMode.KAFKA && kafkaBootstrap.isEmpty()) {
139      throw new IllegalArgumentException("kafkaBootstrap is required for KAFKA ioMode");
140    }
141
142    return new AssembleConfig(
143        ioMode,
144        kafkaBootstrap,
145        kafkaSegmentsTopic,
146        kafkaHttpPairsTopic,
147        kafkaTnPairsTopic,
148        input,
149        output,
150        httpEnabled,
151        tnEnabled,
152        httpOut,
153        tnOut);
154  }
155
156  /**
157   * Resolves the effective HTTP output directory, defaulting under {@link #outputDirectory}.
158   *
159   * @return directory for HTTP output
160   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
161   */
162  public Path effectiveHttpOut() {
163    return httpOutputDirectory.orElseGet(() -> outputDirectory.resolve("http"));
164  }
165
166  /**
167   * Resolves the effective TN3270 output directory, defaulting under {@link #outputDirectory}.
168   *
169   * @return directory for TN3270 output
170   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
171   */
172  public Path effectiveTnOut() {
173    return tnOutputDirectory.orElseGet(() -> outputDirectory.resolve("tn3270"));
174  }
175
176  private static boolean parseBoolean(String value, boolean defaultValue) {
177    if (value == null || value.isBlank()) {
178      return defaultValue;
179    }
180    return Boolean.parseBoolean(value.trim());
181  }
182
183  private static Optional<String> optionalString(String value) {
184    if (value == null) {
185      return Optional.empty();
186    }
187    String trimmed = value.trim();
188    return trimmed.isEmpty() ? Optional.empty() : Optional.of(trimmed);
189  }
190
191  private static Optional<String> sanitizeBootstrap(Optional<String> candidate) {
192    if (candidate == null) {
193      return Optional.empty();
194    }
195    return candidate.map(Net::validateHostPort);
196  }
197
198  private static Optional<Path> optionalPath(String name, String value) {
199    if (value == null || value.isBlank()) {
200      return Optional.empty();
201    }
202    return Optional.of(parsePath(name, value));
203  }
204
205  private static Optional<Path> sanitizeOptionalPath(String name, Optional<Path> candidate) {
206    if (candidate == null || candidate.isEmpty()) {
207      return Optional.empty();
208    }
209    return candidate.map(path -> normalizePath(name, path));
210  }
211
212  private static Path parsePath(String name, String value) {
213    try {
214      return Path.of(Strings.requireNonBlank(name, value)).toAbsolutePath().normalize();
215    } catch (InvalidPathException ex) {
216      throw new IllegalArgumentException(name + " is not a valid path: " + value, ex);
217    }
218  }
219
220  private static Path normalizePath(String name, Path path) {
221    Objects.requireNonNull(path, name + " must not be null");
222    String raw = path.toString();
223    if (raw.indexOf('\0') >= 0) {
224      throw new IllegalArgumentException(name + " must not contain null bytes");
225    }
226    return path.toAbsolutePath().normalize();
227  }
228
229  private static String firstNonBlank(Map<String, String> map, String... keys) {
230    for (String key : keys) {
231      String val = map.get(key);
232      if (val != null && !val.isBlank()) {
233        return val;
234      }
235    }
236    return null;
237  }
238
239  private static IoMode parseIoMode(String value, IoMode fallback) {
240    if (value == null || value.isBlank()) {
241      return fallback;
242    }
243    return IoMode.fromString(value.trim());
244  }
245
246  private static Path defaultBaseDirectory() {
247    String home = System.getProperty("user.home", ".");
248    return Path.of(home, ".radar", "out");
249  }
250}
251
